lines:
Rack 7 Mellen st

Cambridge mana

A sp 13, 1911 
My dear Mr. Strana,

Acading to 
Your kind advice I have 
abeady made an apperoximate 
Caldélation of the expenses 
I may need for my going 
to Sudiana Taking viry 
thing into consideration 
the railway fares, the tuition 
fees and other Miscellaneous 
expuses which may be 
nvolved at the akening 
of College-Festinate that 
the sum of money which 
My plan y going to Indiana 
hay require, fime. 
about two hundred Hollara
raw: Rack 7 Mellen st Cambridge mana A sp 13, 1911 My dear Mr. Strana, Acading to Your kind advice I have abeady made an apperoximate Caldélation of the expenses I may need for my going to Sudiana Taking viry thing into consideration the railway fares, the tuition fees and other Miscellaneous expuses which may be nvolved at the akening of College-Festinate that the sum of money which My plan y going to Indiana hay require, fime. about two hundred Hollara

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter with Luk's estimate of expenses for his trip to Indiana: $200. He asks Stearns to assist with these expenses, assuring him that Luk's father will cover same.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
